m_szDocTitle: CellCube as basis for a fueling station | Sun & Wind Energy
m_szDocSumamry: CellCube as basis for a fueling station CellCube FB 200-400 installation in Martigny (Photo: Gildemeister energy solutions) A Gildemeister CellCube storing system is tested in Martigny (Switzerland) as a basis for a fueling station for battery powered and hydrogen fuel cell vehicles. The power output of the vanadium redox flow storing system is 200 kW, the storage capacity 400 kWh. The project is led by the “Laboratory for Physical and Analytical Electrochemistry” (LEPA) of the “École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne” (EPFL) aiming to delevop a fueling station of the future for vehicles powe
